=== Current Issues ===
Native bcm43xx drivers for the Broadcom 4318 rev 2 do not support anything above 11 mbps (802.11b) connection speed

=== Hardware details ===

* Acer Aspire 5002 WLCi
* AMD Turion 64 Ml-30 processor (1MB L2 cache, 1.6 GHz)
* 15.4" WXGA Acer CrystalBrite TFT LCD (1280x800 native resolution)
* SiS 760 intergrated graphics card (from 32 to 128 MB of memory shared from main system memory)
* 60 GB ATA/100 HDD @ 4200 RPM
* DVD(single layer)/CD-RW Combo drive
* 512 MB DDR333 SDRAM (from 32 to 128 MB shared with the intergrated graphics card)
* Agere '97 Modem
* SiS 900 intergrated 10/100 Mb ethernet port
* WLAN (Broadcom Corporation BCM4318 [AirForce One 54g] 802.11g Wireless LAN Controller (rev 02))
* 3 x USB 2.0 ports
* Intergrated speakers
* Mono Line in, line out audio jacks 
* PC Card slot for one Type II card, 32-bit PC CardBus architecture
* Synaptics touchpad with four-way integrated scroll button 
* 88-key keyboard, inverted T cursor layout, embedded numeric keypad, hotkey controls

==== Notes ====

* Has a switch with LED at the front to toggle WLAN, ndiswrapper drivers have it flashing during data transmission
* Has a switch with LED for Bluetooth due to the generic case design, there is no actual Bluetooth module
* Dimensions with lid closed: 14.3" (364.0mm) W x 11.0" (279.0mm) D x 1.3" - 1.5" (33.9mm - 38.9mm) H 
* Weight: 6.2 lb. (2.8kg) 
* ACPI 1.0b compliant
